Name: Badge Swap
Description: Lets you change badges in battle 4 times. (Equipping or unequipping a badge counts as 1 use). Changing a badge does not cost a turn, but a badge equipped on a single character can only be removed by that character. Badge Swap and the Curse badges can't be changed using this.

Name: Super Curse
Description: For players familiar with RPG combat. Increases enemy HP, attack power, exp gain and money gain by 1.33x in most cases. Items drop more often. Enemies and bosses may have changes to their moves. Environmental effects become more severe.
Hidden Stacking Text: Curse levels past 4x do not stack linearly. (4x, 5.33x, 6x, 8x, 10.66x, 12x, 16x)

Name: Ultra Curse
Description: For expert players not intimidated by strong enemies. Increases enemy HP, attack power, exp gain and money gain by 1.5x in most cases. Item drops become guaranteed. Enemies and bosses may have changes to their moves. Environmental effects become more severe.
Clarification Text: Same as Super Curse but with higher stats.
Hidden Stacking Text: Curse levels past 4x do not stack linearly. (4x, 5.33x, 6x, 8x, 10.66x, 12x, 16x)

Name: Mega Curse
Description: For dauntless players wishing to push the limits of what's possible. Increases enemy HP, attack power, exp gain and money gain by 2.0x in most cases. Item drops become guaranteed. Enemies and bosses may have changes to their moves. Environmental effects become more severe.
Clarification Text: Same as Super Curse but with higher stats. Don't equip this unless you know what you're doing!
Hidden Stacking Text: Curse levels past 4x do not stack linearly. (4x, 5.33x, 6x, 8x, 10.66x, 12x, 16x)

Name: Focus A
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Focus or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Gives 3 Focus.) (L3: Gives 6 Focus.)

Name: Focus B
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Focus or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Gives 3 Focus.) (L3: Gives 6 Focus.)

Name: Multi Stomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Multistomp. Multistomp allows you to attack enemies in a row.

Name: Electro Stomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Electro Stomp or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Bonus damage against targets with defense, decreases target defense (2/3t))
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 more base damage, +2 defense down potency applied.

Name: Taunt
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Taunt. Taunt will inflict Berserk onto all enemies and makes them target the user for the duration of the effect.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 turns of Berserk applied.

Name: Paralyze Stomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Paralyze Stomp. Paralyze Stomp deals Electric damage and can paralyze enemies for 2 turns. Paralyzing enemies will halve their attack power.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 turns of Paralyze applied.

Name: Flame Stomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Flame Stomp or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Inflicts 4 Sunder at the end of turn.)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 more base damage, +2 Sunder applied.

Name: Double Stomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Double Stomp or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Hits 3 times, though the third hit is only 0.75x as strong as the second hit.)

Name: Overstomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Overstomp. Overstomp deals damage equal to your base stomp damage + 12, but has recoil damage equal to your base stomp damage.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +5 damage dealt, +3 recoil damage.

Name: Smart Stomp
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Smart Stomp. Smart Stomp will attempt to inflict the status the target is weakest to, the one with the longest duration of the statuses that work.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 turns of status applied.

Name: Team Quake
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Team Quake or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Hits all enemies 5 times with the same falloff.)

Name: Multi Slash A
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Multislash or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Hits 4 times at +3 cost.) (L3: Hits 6 times at +3 cost.)

Name: Multi Slash B
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Multislash or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Hits 4 times at +3 cost.) (L3: Hits 6 times at +3 cost.)

Name: Slip Slash
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Slip Slash or an upgraded form of it. (L2: +3 cost, but does 1 more damage to bypassed enemies and 2 more damage to the target.)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +1 damage to bypassed enemies and +2 damage to the target.

Name: Poison Slash
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Poison Slash. Poison Slash can poison enemies for 2 turns. Poisoned enemies take damage equal to 10% of their max hp, clamped between 2 and 10 damage.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +2 cost, +2 turns of Poison applied.

Name: Precise Stab
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Precise Stab or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Gets an extra boost if you haven't dealt damage last turn.)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 base damage dealt.

Name: Sword Discharge
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Sword Discharge. Sword Discharge can hit an enemy in any position with electric damage.

Name: Sword Dance
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Sword Dance. Sword Dance allows you to attack any grounded enemy while preserving Focus and giving you some Focus as well. It also swaps your position.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +3 damage dealt. +2 Focus received.

Name: Boomerang Slash
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Boomerang Slash. Boomerang Slash can hit an enemy in any position twice.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 more base damage for both hits.

Name: Aetherize
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Aetherize or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Targets both.) (L3: Targets both, does not inflict Cooldown.)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +6 cost, +1 turn of Ethereal applied.

Name: Dark Slash
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Dark Slash or an upgraded form of it. (L2: Bonus damage is based on difference in HP percentages between user and target.)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +6 cost, +3 base damage dealt.

Name: Flame Bat
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Flame Bat. (Slash - 3 damage to anything, gives back turn if success)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 base damage dealt.

Name: Astral Wall
Description: Gives Wilex access to the move Astral Wall. (Caps incoming damage to 1/4 max hp per turn, but if you take damage it gets removed when your turn starts)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +2 cost, Damage cap changes to 1 / (1 + level)

Name: Brace A
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Brace or an upgraded form of it. (L2 = 3 absorb, L3 = 6 absorb)

Name: Brace B
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Brace or an upgraded form of it. (L2 = 3 absorb, L3 = 6 absorb)

Name: Dash Through
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Dash Through or an upgraded form of it. L2 ignores hazards (increases damage per enemies hit through to full jump damage)

Name: Flip Kick
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Flip Kick. (omni target jump move with stomp damage)

Name: Fluff Heal
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Fluff Heal. (3hp/3t if successful action command)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 more HP healed per turn.

Name: Sleep Stomp
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Sleep Stomp. (2t sleep inflict with stomp damage)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 turns of Sleep applied.

Name: Meteor Stomp
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Meteor Stomp or an upgraded form of it. Inflicts defocus (causes debuffs to act like buffs?)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 more base damage, +2 attack down potency applied.

Name: Under Strike
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Under Strike or an upgraded form of it. More hits? (hits twice but second hit is half strength, 6 defocus)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 more base damage for both hits, defocus applied is equal to 3x level.

Name: Iron Stomp
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Iron Stomp. (stomp + 4 + (defense))
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, damage increases by 1, damage boost given by defense is doubled.

Name: Elemental Stomp
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Elemental Stomp. (Chooses best element to use, stomp damage base?)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +5 cost, Each level adds an additional element to damage dealt.

Name: Team Throw
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Team Throw or an upgraded form of it. More damage (+6)

Name: Power Smash A
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Power Smash or an upgraded form of it. More damage (5 more damage for +3 cost)

Name: Power Smash B
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Power Smash or an upgraded form of it. More damage (5 more damage for +3 cost)

Name: Dazzle Smash
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Dazzle Smash. (2t dizzy inflict with smash damage)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +2 cost, +2 turns of Dizzy applied.

Name: Hammer Throw
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Hammer Throw or an upgraded form of it. More damage

Name: Breaker Smash
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Breaker Smash or an upgraded form of it. Damage boost based on number of hits taken this turn
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 base damage dealt.

Name: Flame Smash
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Flame Smash or an upgraded form of it. Unlocks the move - (fire element smash)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +3 base damage dealt.

Name: Momentum Smash
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Momentum Smash. Unlocks the move - (hits enemies into behind)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 damage dealt. +1 absorb received.

Name: Quake Smash
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Quake Smash. Unlocks the move - (smash damage to all grounded)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +2 base damage dealt.

Name: Illuminate
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Illuminate or an upgraded form of it. Unlocks L3
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +2 turns of Illuminate and Parry Aura applied.

Name: Light Smash
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Light Smash or an upgraded form of it. Changes formula (based on similar hp proportion)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +6 cost, +3 base damage dealt.

Name: Hammer Beat
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Hammer Beat. Unlocks the move (4 hp recovery also gives action back if successful)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +3 cost, +3 hp healed and +1 Focus applied.

Name: Mist Wall
Description: Gives Luna access to the move Mist Wall. Unlocks the move - (+1 resistance for 3 turns)
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: +4 cost, +1 potency for Mist Wall.

Name: Strange Egg
Description: Unlocks strange egg based moves for both characters.
Clarification Text: Eggs produced by these moves will disappear from your inventory at the end of battle. Eggs produced by these moves do not count for Item Saver.
Hidden Stacking Text: Higher levels: Double Egg costs 3 more and produces 1 more egg, Egg Toss costs 2 more and produces 1 more egg that is used immediately.

Name: Status Relay
Description: Allows you to take the action "Status Relay", which will transfer most effects to the other character.

Name: Voracious Eater
Description: The user can't use items, but items are 33% more effective when used on them.

Name: Multi Supply
Description: Allows you to use the item move Multi Supply 2 times per battle, which lets you use three items in the same turn.

Name: Quick Supply
Description: Allows you to use the item move Quick Supply 2 times per battle, which lets you use an item then do another action.

Name: Void Supply
Description: Allows you to use the item move Void Supply 2 times per battle, which lets you use an item that was already used earlier in that battle.

Name: Item Boost
Description: Items used by the user are 33% stronger.

Name: Item Saver
Description: When the character uses 2 items, they get a freebie, which causes the next item used to not be removed from your inventory.
Clarification Text: Items that produce other items will produce nothing if they are a freebie.) (Void Bite does not count for item uses.
Hidden Stacking Text: Freebie potency increases by 1 per badge equipped.

Name: HP Plus A
Description: Increases your Max HP by 6.

Name: HP Plus B
Description: Increases your Max HP by 6.

Name: HP Plus C
Description: Increases your Max HP by 6.

Name: HP Plus D
Description: Increases your Max HP by 6.

Name: EP Plus A
Description: Increases your Max EP by 6.

Name: EP Plus B
Description: Increases your Max EP by 6.

Name: EP Plus C
Description: Increases your Max EP by 6.

Name: EP Plus D
Description: Increases your Max EP by 6.

Name: SE Plus A
Description: Increases your Max SE by 6.

Name: SE Plus B
Description: Increases your Max SE by 6.

Name: Last Counter
Description: When you die, the attacker takes damage equal to your hp before getting hit.

Name: Last Chance
Description: Allows you to survive one lethal hit, with the damage from the lethal hit being reduced to 0. (1/battle)
Hidden Stacking Text: Gives you additional uses of this badge.

Name: Last Burst
Description: When you die, you recover energy equal to half of your max EP.

Name: Risky Power
Description: When you are at low HP, your Attack is increased by 2.

Name: Risky Shield
Description: When you are at low HP, you gain 50% resistance to damage.

Name: Risky Endurance
Description: When you are at low HP, your Endurance is increased by 1. (Endurance reduces energy costs.)

Name: Protective Power
Description: When the other character is at low hp, your Attack is increased by 1.

Name: Protective Shield
Description: When the other character is at low hp, you gain 33% resistance to damage.

Name: Protective Endurance
Description: When the other character is at low hp, your Endurance is increased by 1. (Endurance reduces energy costs.)

Name: Perfect Power
Description: When you are at Max HP, your Attack is increased by 2.

Name: Perfect Shield
Description: When you are at Max HP, you gain 50% resistance to damage.

Name: Perfect Endurance
Description: When you are at Max HP, your Endurance is increased by 1.

Name: First Power
Description: At the start of battle, you gain 3 Focus. (Focus increases your Attack for your next attacking move.)

Name: First Shield
Description: At the start of battle, you gain 3 Absorb. (Absorb increases your Defense for the next enemy attack.)

Name: First Endurance
Description: At the start of battle, you gain 3 Burst. (Burst increases your Endurance for the next energy move you use.)

Name: Energetic Power
Description: When you are at Max EP, your Attack is increased by 2.

Name: Energy Shield
Description: You gain 50% resistance to damage at the cost of EP. (2 EP per 1 damage taken). If you don't have enough energy, this badge becomes inactive.

Name: Energy Burst
Description: When you are at Max EP, your Endurance is increased by 3. (Endurance reduces energy costs.)

Name: Agile Power
Description: When you are at Max Stamina, your Attack is increased by 2.

Name: Agile Shield
Description: When you are at Max Stamina, you gain 50% resistance to damage.

Name: Agile Endurance
Description: When you are at Max Stamina, your Endurance is increased by 3.

Name: Spirit Power
Description: Your Attack is increased by 1 at the cost of 3 SE per hit. If you don't have enough SE, your Attack is decreased instead.

Name: Spirit Shield
Description: You gain 50% resistance to damage at the cost of SE. (2 SE per 1 damage taken). If you don't have enough SE, this badge becomes inactive.

Name: Spirit Flow
Description: The cost of soul moves are decreased by 3 for this character.

Name: Golden Power
Description: Your Attack is increased by 1 at the cost of 10 coins per hit. If you don't have enough coins, your Attack is decreased instead.

Name: Golden Shield
Description: You gain 50% resistance to damage at the cost of coins. (10 coins per 1 damage taken). If you don't have enough coins, this badge becomes inactive.

Name: Refund
Description: Using items will give you coins equal to 75% of the item's selling price.

Name: Dark Power
Description: When your SE is at or below 1/3 of your Max SE, your Attack is increased by 1.

Name: Dark Shield
Description: When your SE is at or below 1/3 of your Max SE, you gain 33% resistance to damage.

Name: Dark Endurance
Description: Your Endurance is increased by 1 but Soul Moves cost twice as much as they do normally. (Endurance reduces energy costs.)

Name: Null Power
Description: When you are at or below 6 EP, your Attack is increased by 1.

Name: Null Shield
Description: When you are at or below 6 EP, you gain 33% resistance to damage.

Name: Null Endurance
Description: When you are at or below 6 EP, the energy costs of moves are reduced by half (after all other reductions).

Name: Attack Boost A
Description: Increases your Attack by 1.

Name: Attack Boost B
Description: Increases your Attack by 1.

Name: Defense Boost A
Description: Increases your Defense by 1.

Name: Defense Boost B
Description: Increases your Defense by 1.

Name: Endurance Boost A
Description: Increases your Endurance by 1. (Endurance reduces energy costs.)

Name: Endurance Boost B
Description: Increases your Endurance by 1. (Endurance reduces energy costs.)

Name: Agility Boost A
Description: Increases your Agility by 2.

Name: Agility Boost B
Description: Increases your Agility by 2.

Name: Vital Energy
Description: Use HP instead of energy (1 to 1 but costs are -1)

Name: Soulful Energy
Description: Use SE instead of energy (1 to 1 but costs are -1)

Name: Stamina Energy
Description: Use stamina instead of energy (at quadruple cost)

Name: Golden Energy
Description: Use coins instead of energy at a rate of 5 coins per ep (Stamina costs are normal)

Name: Energetic Soul
Description: Allows you to pay for soul moves using energy (Costs are 1 ep to 2 se but don't cost stamina)

Name: Healthy Exercise
Description: Get 1 hp for every 6 stamina used (rounded up)

Name: Soft Power
Description: Increases your Attack by 1, but you can't use weapon moves (If Metal Power is also equipped on this character, you regenerate 2 hp per turn.)

Name: Metal Power
Description: Increases your Attack by 1, but you can't use jump moves (If Soft Power is also equipped on this character, your Defense is increased by 2.)

Name: Attack Formation
Description: The character in the front gains 1 Attack and loses 1 Defense. The character in the back gains 1 Defense and loses 1 Attack. (If combined with Defense Formation, the changes to defense are removed, and the changes to attack are +2 and -2 instead.)

Name: Defense Formation
Description: The character in the front gains 1 Defense and loses 1 Attack. The character in the back gains 1 Attack and loses 1 Defense. (If combined with Attack Formation, the changes to attack are removed, and the changes to defense are +2 and -2 instead.)

Name: Magic Clock
Description: Over the course of 4 turns, this badge cycles between increasing Attack by 2, increasing Defense by 2, decreasing Attack by 2, and decreasing Defense by 2.

Name: Power Gear
Description: For every 4th hit, your Attack is increased by 3, but your Attack is decreased by 1 for the other 3 hits.

Name: Shield Gear
Description: For every 4th hit taken, your Defense is increased by 3, but your Defense is decreased by 1 for the other 3 hits taken.

Name: Energy Gear
Description: For every 4th energy costing move used, your Endurance is increased by 3, but your Endurance is decreased by 1 for the other 3 moves. (Endurance reduces energy costs.) (0 cost moves will be unaffected)

Name: Power Momentum
Description: Exhaustion penalty is doubled (from 25% per action taken to 50% per action taken), but your Attack is increased by 2 for every action taken after the first. (The second action has 2 more Attack)

Name: Tenacious Strikes
Description: Enemies can no longer be immune to damage from your attacks under almost every circumstance. (Minimum damage for every hit is 1)

Name: Health Growth
Description: Every turn at max health makes you get 2 absorb

Name: Energy Growth
Description: Every turn at max energy makes you get 2 burst

Name: Health Regen A
Description: You regenerate 1 HP every turn.

Name: Health Regen B
Description: You regenerate 1 HP every turn.

Name: Energy Regen A
Description: You regenerate 1 EP every turn.

Name: Energy Regen B
Description: You regenerate 1 EP every turn.

Name: Soul Regen
Description: Increases SE regen rate by 2 per turn.

Name: Health Balance
Description: Every turn, the character with a higher health percentage loses some HP, while the character with a lower health percentage gains some HP. (Up to 5hp per turn, until health percentages are equalized.)
Hidden Stacking Text: Increases the HP that is healed or removed.

Name: Effect Boost
Description: Increases the turn count of effects you inflict on enemies by 50%. This includes statuses, but this does not circumvent the status turn limit.

Name: Status Boost
Description: Increases the status susceptibility threshold by 50%. (i.e. you can inflict statuses with enemies at higher HP.)

Name: Status Conversion
Description: Increases the status susceptibility threshold by 50% if the enemy already has a status. (i.e. you can inflict statuses with enemies at higher HP.)

Name: Status Catalyst
Description: Certain damage types and status combinations will cause the status durations to increase by 1 turn (1/battle for each enemy) (Light <rarrow> Freeze, Water <rarrow> Sleep, Air <rarrow> Paralyze, Dark <rarrow> Poison, Fire <rarrow> Berserk, Earth <rarrow> Dizzy)

Name: Status Exploit
Description: Certain damage types do 50% more damage against certain statused targets. (Light <rarrow> Dizzy, Water <rarrow> Paralyze, Air <rarrow> Poison, Dark <rarrow> Sleep, Fire <rarrow> Berserk, Earth <rarrow> Freeze)

Name: Instinct
Description: Attacks hit while dizzy at 50% attack power

Name: Dizzy Momentum
Description: Energy costs are halved

Name: Trance
Description: 5% se regen per turn (rounds up)

Name: Dizzy Agility
Description: Agility is 50% higher

Name: Hypno Strike
Description: Attacking a dizzy target inflicts 1 Defocus per hit

Name: Unsteady Stance
Description: Get 2t dizzy (*since dizzy ticks down right after you use turn relay and so 2t needed to actually matter) whenever you use turn relay, but it gives the target 1 turn worth of stamina

Name: Capacitor
Description: 2 focus per turn

Name: Resistor
Description: 33% resistance to damage

Name: Generator
Description: 5% ep per turn (rounds up)

Name: Inductor
Description: While paralyzed, enemies take 3 electric contact hazard damage from you if they use a contact attack.

Name: Conductor
Description: When you attack a paralyzed target, get 1 focus at end of turn

Name: Overexert
Description: Get 2t paralyze every time you attack, but +3 attack. If you don't receive the paralyze, you get 3 defocus instead.

Name: Sleepwalk
Description: Attack with berserk rules at 50% power

Name: Deep Sleep
Description: Can't get hit out of sleep but heal 20% max hp (min 4) per turn

Name: Sweet Dreams
Description: Sleep heals energy instead of hp

Name: Light Sleep
Description: Auto block when asleep

Name: Nightmare Strike
Description: Deal +50% damage and inflict 3 defocus when you wake up a target

Name: Quick Nap
Description: Start battle 2t asleep (*if you first strike the sleep turn happens after that)
Hidden Stacking Text: Sleep potency increases by 1 for each badge equipped.

Name: Rage's Power
Description: Permanent berserker but +2 atk

Name: Rage Shield
Description: Take 50% damage from contact hazards, removes -1 defense penalty
Hidden Stacking Text: Defense increases by 1 for each badge equipped, resistance to contact hazards increases as well.

Name: Rage Rally
Description: Other character gets a +1 attack boost

Name: Undying Rage
Description: Survive 1 lethal hit per battle while berserk
Hidden Stacking Text: Gives you an additional use of the badge per battle.

Name: Aggravate
Description: Hits against berserk enemies do +50% damage but apply 3 focus

Name: Vengeful Rage
Description: Get 2t berserk and 3 focus when the other character dies
Hidden Stacking Text: Focus is increased with each additional badge equipped.

Name: Toxic Strength
Description: 2 attack when poisoned, but get 2 sunder per turn

Name: Toxic Shield
Description: 2 defense when poisoned, but get 1 defocus when hit

Name: Toxic Energy
Description: Receive 3 energy per turn, but also increases poison damage by 50%

Name: Toxic Resistance
Description: Poison causes you to lose energy instead of health, if you have energy.

Name: Nerve Strike
Description: When you attack a poisoned enemy, inflict +2 sunder per hit

Name: Weak Stomach
Description: Get 2t poison when an item is used on the user (but items that aren't normally heal over time give you 20% healing over 2 turns)
Hidden Stacking Text: Get 2 additional turns of poison and heal over time per badge equipped.

Name: Frost Edge
Description: 3 light damage contact hazard

Name: Ice Shell
Description: +2 defense while frozen

Name: Glacier
Description: Getting hit no longer unfreezes, get +2 absorb per turn

Name: Preservative
Description: Effect turn durations will not tick down from 1 to 0 while frozen (Does not apply to the Effect Stasis effect)

Name: Icebreaker
Description: Getting unfrozen (by getting hit) gives you 3 focus, +50% damage when unfreezing targets

Name: Supercooled
Description: Get 2t frozen every time you get hit while unfrozen but +2 defense (*note: when frozen this is effectively only a +1)

Name: Health Sight
Description: Reveals enemy health even if you haven't tattled the enemy yet.

Name: Defense Sight
Description: Reveals enemy defense. (when their health bars are displayed)

Name: Status Sight
Description: Reveals information about enemy status weaknesses (when you select the move and hover over an enemy)

Name: Charm Sight
Description: Reveals information about your currently active charms.

Name: Power Sight
Description: Reveals information about the attack power of your moves.

Name: Item Sight
Description: Reveals information about what effects your items will have.

Name: Battle Sight
Description: Reveals various statistics about your time in battle. (Turn count, damage dealt, number of hits, items used)

Name: Soft Touch
Description: No longer wake enemies on hit or break freeze, half damage from contact hazards in general

Name: Perfect Victory
Description: If you defeat all enemies with perfect damage, XP gained is multiplied by 1.5x at the end of battle.
Hidden Stacking Text: Multiplier increases by 0.5 for each badge equipped.

Name: Decisive Victory
Description: Defeating a battle in one turn doubles exp and money gain.
Hidden Stacking Text: Multiplier increases by 1 for each badge equipped.

Name: Status Resist A
Description: Most negative effects last half as long (Blocking will negate status infliction)

Name: Status Resist B
Description: Most negative effects last half as long (Blocking will negate status infliction)

Name: Charm Boost
Description: Increases the strength of Power charm effects. (+3 <rarrow> +5)
Hidden Stacking Text: Power increases by 2 for each badge equipped.

Name: Ribbon Power
Description: Ribbon rest effects are tripled but you also gain statuses or other negative effects
Hidden Stacking Text: Positive effect multiplier increases by 3 for each badge equipped, negative effect multiplier increases by 1.

Name: Ribbon Swap
Description: Allows you to change ribbons in battle. Changing ribbons does not take up your turn. Only the character wearing a ribbon can remove it from themselves.

Name: Long Rest
Description: Inn rest effects are 50% stronger, Effects for using Rest are 50% stronger if you rest last turn

Name: Health Steal
Description: Attacks siphon a small amount of HP, but -1 atk (1/hit)

Name: Energy Steal
Description: Attacks siphon a small amount of EP, but -1 atk (1/hit)

Name: Risky Rush
Description: 3 focus when you take damage that puts you in danger range (or at exactly 1 hp)

Name: Protective Rush
Description: Focus when ally is hit (1/enemy turn)

Name: Perfect Focus
Description: Healing to max gives you 3 focus

Name: Head Start
Description: Gives you another action at the start of battle and you get 50% more stamina on the first turn.

Name: Risky Start
Description: Start battle at low hp (lowers your hp)
Hidden Stacking Text: Wearing 2 or more will cause you to start at 1 hp.

Name: Victory Heal
Description: Get 3 health at the end of battle

Name: Victory Surge
Description: Get 3 energy at the end of battle

Name: Agility Rush
Description: Reaching max stamina gives you an extra turn (1/battle)
Hidden Stacking Text: Each additional badge gives you an extra use per battle.

Name: Stamina Rebound
Description: When you reach exactly 0 stamina after using a move, you get stamina equal to half your agility.

Name: Money Boost
Description: Boosts coin drops

Name: Dark Concentration
Description: SE regen per turn is removed but Rest gives 3 more SE

Name: Depletion Burst
Description: Getting to 0 energy by using a move gives you 5 energy

Name: Revival Flame
Description: (1/battle) When you die to an attack by an enemy with higher max HP than you, you will be restored to max HP and gain 6 focus
Hidden Stacking Text: Each additional badge gives you an extra use per battle.

Name: Death Swap
Description: If this character would die (and the other character is alive), the other character dies instead

Name: Skill Swap
Description: User can use abilities from the other character at 1.5x cost

Name: Focus Recycling
Description: Save half focus when used

Name: Absorb Recycling
Description: Save half absorb when used

Name: Burst Recycling
Description: Save half burst when used

Name: Stamina Recycling
Description: Saves half stamina when used

Name: Weather Shield
Description: Reduces the strength of most environmental effects.

Name: Overkill
Description: First strikes will instantly kill enemies that don't give exp.
Hidden Stacking Text: Level required to kill enemies is reduced by 2 per badge equipped after the first.

Name: Smart Ambush
Description: First Strikes give you an additional action instead of an attack

Name: Auto Strike
Description: All overworld encounters count as you first striking the enemy (unless the enemy first strikes you)

Name: Invite Danger
Description: Normal enemy battles start as enemy first strikes, but you start with 2 focus (4 if you would normally first strike). Overrides effects that would normally prevent enemy first strikes.

Name: Item Finder
Description: Greatly increases the chance that enemies will drop items. (Guaranteed if the encounter won't give xp)
Hidden Stacking Text: Item drop rate can go above 100% which will make it possible to get multiple items from one encounter.

Name: Dodge Step
Description: Prevents you from getting hit by enemy first strikes. Allows you to use the action "Easy Flee" which guarantees escape but causes you to lose energy.

Name: Stealth Step
Description: Makes it harder for overworld enemies to target you by reducing their cone of vision.

Name: Haste Step
Description: Move 20% faster in the overworld.
